name: Enslaved by Flames
description:
Press ESC if you want to regain control over your mouse.
Press TAB to access menu. Controls:
- WSAD to MOVE
- LEFT mouse button to SHOOT
- RIGHT mouse button to SLOW TIME
- SPACE to JUMP
- R to RELOAD
- SHIFT to WALK Thank you for visiting me here!

Enslaved by Flames is a dreamlike, survial shooter mixed with Vampire Survivors style of gameplay. There is a also a twist - you cannot leave your Fire as it provides crucial light that protects you from a deadly darkness.
You level up your skills and your Fire in order to survive as long as possible, while infinite hordes of enemies swarm your position in order to exterminate you and your precious Flames. 

Two characters - two characters with different starting statistics and skills.

Two difficulty levels - Normal and Easy

Multiple autogenerated enemies - plus one creepy hand that hates your fire!

Genre: Oldschool shooter/survival

Tips:

- Avoid darkness!
- Stay near the fire to heal!
- Beware the DARK HAND! It aims to extinguish the Fire.
- Collect gems to level up and gain new skills!
- Burn presents to level up the Fire!
- The arrows near the center of the screen will warn you if an enemy is behind you.
- Have fun!

In future updates:

- lots of balance changes
- new skills
- new powerups
- new character archetypes
- new enemy types and improved wave system
